title: I've been told that I have an innate sensuality. What does it mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: Innate means natural, so something you’re born with. Sensual means pleasing to the senses. It is often used in a sexual context. I would suggest being told you have “innate sensuality” means one, or both, of the following: They are complimenting you on your natural ability to excite their senses when they see you, watch you move, hear you talk, your aroma, when you touch, or all of the above.They would like to join you in making the beast with two backs.
